Contents.Key: <log4net> <appender name="RollingLogFileAppender" type="log4net.Appender.RollingFileAppender"> <file value="McAfeeService.log" /> <threshold value="INFO" /> <appendToFile value="true" /> <rollingStyle value="Size" /> <maxSizeRollBackups value="10" /> <maximumFileSize value="1MB" /> <staticLogFileName value="true" /> <layout type="log4net.Layout.PatternLayout"> <conversionPattern value="%-5p %d - %m%n" /> </layout> </appender> <appender name="ColoredConsoleAppender" type="log4net.Appender.ColoredConsoleAppender"> <threshold value="INFO"/> <filter type="log4net.Filter.LevelRangeFilter"> <levelMin value="INFO" /> <acceptOnMatch value="true" /> </filter> <filter type="log4net.Filter.DenyAllFilter" /> <mapping> <level value="INFO"/> <foreColor value="Green, HighIntensity"/> </mapping> <mapping> <level value="TRACE"/> <foreColor value="White"/> </mapping> <mapping> <level value="DEBUG"/> <foreColor value="Cyan, HighIntensity"/> </mapping> <mapping> <level value="WARN"/> <foreColor value="Yellow, HighIntensity"/> </mapping> <mapping> <level value="ERROR"/> <foreColor value="Red, HighIntensity"/> </mapping> <mapping> <level value="FATAL"/> <foreColor value="Purple, HighIntensity"/> </mapping> <layout type="log4net.Layout.PatternLayout"> <conversionPattern value="%message%newline"/> </layout> </appender> <root> <appender-ref ref="RollingLogFileAppender" /> <appender-ref ref="ColoredConsoleAppender" /> </root> </log4net>

<add name="RaidenAppProfilesEntities" connectionString="metadata=res://*/RaidenAppFrofilesDataModel.csdl|res://*/RaidenAppFrofilesDataModel.ssdl|res://*/RaidenAppFrofilesDataModel.msl;provider=System.Data.SqlClient;provider connection string=';data source=BeaAv1DBprof1;initial catalog=RaidenAppProfiles;persist security info=True;user id=SQLUser;password=SQLUser;multipleactiveresultsets=True;App=EntityFramework';" providerName="System.Data.EntityClient"/>
